functions.name: k8s_rbac_mfa_enforcement
functions.description: Checks if RBAC MFA enforcement is configured for k8s_authentication.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes K8S_AUTHENTICATION API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
K8S_AUTHENTICATION is a Kubernetes component for authentication management.
Configuration, security, monitoring, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
